text: chaur anak( mou ham meat) kom sa la t knong mea sche t noh chea dach khat . te mea sche t( kou hpa k) del trauv ban ke ksang laeng samreab chea kruah nei kar kaotakhlach a l laoh tangpi thngai dambaung vea sakdesam bamphot del anak trauv sa la t now tinoh . now tinoh mean borsa cheachraen del puokke chaul chetd pheap saatasam . haey a l laoh sraleanh banda anak del saatasam
